body.draft-comment: WH-1439 Allow XSLT extensions to be specified in the template descriptor
body.p: The WebHelp Publishing Template allows you to specify one or more XSLT extension points. They are helpful when you want to change the structure of the HTML pages that are mainly generated from XSLT processing.
Please see the WebHelp Responsive XSLT-Import and XSLT-Parameter Extension Points topic to see all the available extension points.
